lead_paragraph: SOMMER--Evelyn M.,91, on January 27, 2016. She worked full-time as a patent attorney for over 60 years, until 10 days before her death. Devoted to her husband of 57 years, Rudolph Sommer, who predeceased her. She leaves three children, Peter Sommer, Cathy Iselin, and Tim Sommer, as well as three grandchildren, Adele, John, and Lucy. Graveside service 2pm, Sunday, January 31, at Spring Grove Cemetery in Darien, CT. Donations may be made in her memory to Cambridge Friends School Playscape, Cambridge Friends School, 5 Cadbury Road, Cambridge, MA 02140. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SOMMER, EVELYN M.
